abstract: When Microsoft announced its $44.6 billion bid to buy Yahoo on Friday, inquiring minds wanted to know whether or not the deal was likely to go through. But many were also asking a different question: Even if the deal is approved, can these two technology titans work together?
lead_paragraph: When Microsoft announced its $44.6 billion bid to buy Yahoo on Friday, inquiring minds wanted to know whether or not the deal was likely to go through. But many were also asking a different question: Even if the deal is approved, can these two technology titans work together?

headline.main: Fitting the Pieces in an Internet Mega-Merger
